captions.text: THE MATCH
-Beer?
-Yes.
-Junk food?
-Yes.
-We're ready for the final match! We're in this together!
-Take the same positions we had when we passed the semifinals!
-Don't even move! It's very important!
-So...like this?
-Exactly! Exactly!
-Our night is about to start...junk food...beer...soccer...men only...
-Men only? I invited Anna because she was home alone
-Mirko...Anna is a girl! She is going to ask questions! Mirko, soccer is for men! Ballet is for women!
-Do men go see Ballet?
-No Mirko, we don't!! We don't...
-Goodevening!
-She really is here!
-What's wrong?
-Nothing, don't worry
-Go away!
-Amazing!! We're the white ones right?
-You can't take the ball with your hands
-The goalie...he can
-The people in yellow you see running are the refereers and linesmen
-Why are you so excited? We're losing
-When the stricker goes...I mean when the defensor...I mean the defensor has the striker behind his back right?
-It's just like when you put your lipstick on and you leave the mark on your teeth
-That "colored paper" is the cards!
-No you won't find it in a club
-Goal is just 1 point, when you play basketball it is 3 points...
-He injured his knee that's why he can't stand up!
-Please don't make me explain basketball rules...
-He injured...it's....it's broken okay?
-No it's not 6 points if you make a goal from outside the box...it's still 1 point...
-Okay he may not be good-looking...but he's a very talented player
-Veronica is the name of the thing he just did, not his wife's name
-"He throw him"...it doesn't mean he threw up on him, he just threw away the ball
-You say "goal" when the ball goes in the rectangle with the net on it...no, it's not a fishing net
-They call "spoon" the thing he just did...not the...why am I still talking to you? You can't understand
-Mirko...enough...you're asking questions since the beginning of the match, shut up!!! You're never gonna understand soccer!
-Gosh, move you jerk!! Idiot!!
-Sorry guys, a quick question...
-SHUT UP!!
THE SCRATCH CARD
-C'mon!! Come on!!
-Oh my God!! Oh my God! I'm rich!! I'm disgustingly rick!!
-Don't look at me like that...I finally am out of this dump house that smells like corpse
-I can't stand you anymore! You and your stupid problems, I - am - out! And you know what?
-I stole your food, I broke your laptop because it blocked on YouTube while I was watching "The Big Brother" that we all criticize but secretely watch!
-I changed our schedule for the domestic chores so I never cleaned the house, I always payed my part of the bills with your money and yes, Mirko, you snore when you sleep.
-I put the bleach on your colored clothes, I always changed your Facebook status and it was always me...
-...who didn't win. You need two similar simbols to win and you just have one
-...telling you I did it! I got the part for that Comedy "Me and my Roommates"...aren't you happy for me? I was just studying the script...
-Anyway I don't watch the "Big Brother"
-Me neither
-Piè, is that my wallet?
-No...will you come and see my Comedy?
-Of course!
-Idiot...
-Vote now! Who will leave the house?
-Send a text message to 1-oh-2 and write 'L' if you want to vote for Marco
-...or 'A' to vote for Erika
-This show sucks...I seriously don't like it at all
-Who are you texting?
-I am texting to save Marco...Mamma!! To save Mamma!
-...our little secret?
-...okay! So we're saving Marco?
-Yes! He deserves it!
-Anyway, did I tell you Mirko is obsessed with "The Great Beauty" now?

title: COINQUILINI - EP.6 - LA PARTITA DEL GRANDE FRATELLO
